articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: India is largest supplier of refined fuels to Europe: Report - Mint
articles.description: Europe's refined fuel imports from India are set to surge above 360,000 barrels a day, edging just ahead of those of Saudi Arabia,
articles.content: India has become Europe's largest supplier of refined fuels this month, according to data from analytics firm Kpler. This is while simultaneously buying record amounts of Russian crude, according to … [+1969 chars]
